snippet: A new map detailing all known geologic faults east of Denver was issued Tuesday by the government and Electric Power Research Institute, a nonprofit electric research group.
abstract: New map detailing all known geologic faults east of Denver is issued by the government and the Electric Power Research Institute, opening the way for nuclear power plants in the United States to embark on a broad re-evaluation of their vulnerability to earthquakes.
lead_paragraph: A new map detailing all known geologic faults east of Denver was issued Tuesday by the government and Electric Power Research Institute, a nonprofit electric research group.

headline.main: Map of Earthquake Risks Is Updated
headline.print_headline: Map Of Earthquake Risks Is Updated
